post.description: Endpoint to generate a Bearer/JWT Authentication Token based on the users Username & Password. When calling other endpoints, include this token under the Header value Authorization as proof of authenticity (Bearer security scehema is also accepted). Tokens persist for 1 hour after being issued and can exist concurrently.'

example.message: Access denied -  Please check that your username and password are correct.  Please be aware that usernames and passwords are case sensitive. If the problem persists, please contact your Creditsafe account manager.

/authenticate.x-amf-description: Calls to Connect require a valid JWT Authentication Token to be supplied as a REST Header. An Authentication Token can be generated by calling the POST /authenticate endpoint with your CS Connect credentials. Please note that both username + password are case sensitive.

get.description: Endpoint to search for Companies based on supplied Search Criteria.

parameters.name: countries
parameters.description: A Comma-separated list of country codes to search for Companies in. The list takes ISO/Alpha 2 format country codes. For example US,GB represents searching for Companies in the United States and Great Britain.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Search Language -  Typically only used for Countries where more than one  Company Names exist in different languages. Such as Companies with a Japanese Kanji and English names.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Connect Id - The primary Company identifier that is used to uniquely identify all companies across Creditsafe's Universe and Partner Network. This is returned on all Company Search Results. Use this field to use in other operations such as Ordering Company Credit Report by Id, and Adding Company to Monitoing Portfolio. </br></br> [Searching by Connect ID is a slightly redundant operation (can be used as a fast-lookup to Search Result fields) as the purpose of Search is to obtain this identifier].

parameters.name: safeNo
parameters.description: Safe Number - Creditsafe's identifier on all Companies owned in the Creditsafe Universe. This is returned on all Company Search Results

parameters.name: regNo
parameters.description: Local Company Identifier - The Company identifier typically associated with a Government Filing Agency. i.e. French SIREN/SIRET, United Kingdom Companies House CRN

parameters.name: vatNo
parameters.description: Company VAT Number

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Company Name

parameters.name: tradeName
parameters.description: Trade Name of the Company, typically used in Countries where Name is not uniquely registered.

parameters.name: acronym
parameters.description: A non-unique identifier to look for Companies by their more commonly known acronym rather than their lesser known full name. Acronym is predominantly available on French Companies.

parameters.name: exact
parameters.description: Provide as true to find Companies matching a Name exactly.

parameters.name: street
parameters.description: Address part identifier - Street of the Company

parameters.name: houseNo
parameters.description: Address part identifier - House/Building Number of the Company

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: Address part identifier - City of the Company

parameters.name: postCode
parameters.description: Address part identifier - Postcode/Zip Code of the Company. Can be provided partially to extend to a region with a * as a wildcard. I.e. CF* can represnt all postcodes starting with CF.

parameters.name: province
parameters.description: Address part identifier - Province/State of the Company

parameters.name: phone
parameters.description: Phone Number of the Company

parameters.name: officeType
parameters.description: Indicates whether the Company is a Head Office or a Branch

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Indicates whether the Company is Active/Trading

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Indicates whether the Company is Limited or NonLimited. Countries without a concept of Limited/NonLimited Companies will not be affected by this parameter

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Number of Companies per page

parameters.name: callRef
parameters.description: Call Reference

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Authentication Token obtained from /authenticate. Can be expressed in the format "bearer tokenValue" or "tokenValue" alone."

address.simpleValue: KIMBOLTON ROAD, BOLNHURST, BEDFORD, BEDFORDSHIRE, MK44 2ES
HESKETH HOUSE 43-45 PORTMAN SQUARE, 43-45 PORTMAN SQUARE, LONDON, Greater London, W1H 6HN

messages.text: No companies matching specified search criteria found.

/companies.x-amf-description: Endpoint to search for Companies based on supplied Search Criteria.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Report Language - The JSON structure of the Report is language invariant, but field content will return as the given language, where available.

parameters.name: template
parameters.description: Optional parameter to request a Templated Company Report. A Template adds/reduces sections of the Credit Report depending on your subscription. Do not include this parameter if you have not been given a template to use.

parameters.name: customData
parameters.description: A Key-Value pair (as a string format key::value) that is required for certain Report requests. I.e. German Report Reason Code. Use /reportcustomdata/{country} endpoint to see the necessary structure/values.

parameters.name: callRef
parameters.description: Call Reference

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Connect Id to order Company Credit Report.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Authentication Token obtained from /authenticate. Can be expressed in the format "bearer tokenValue" or "tokenValue" alone."

/companies/{id}.x-amf-description: This endpoint orders a Credit Report for a Company by its Connect Id. </br> The Company Credit Report is a JSON object comprising of key business/financial data points, including its Credit Score & Limit. A full list of Company data points can be found in the Data Dictionaries.

get.description: Provide a Comma-separated list of country codes to return a set of fields common across all countries to search on

parameters.name: countries
parameters.description: A comma separated list of ISO/Alpha 2 format country codes, or singular country Code. e.g. US,GB will return the common searchable Company fields in the United States and Great Britain.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Authentication Token obtained from /authenticate. Can be expressed in the format "bearer tokenValue" or "tokenValue" alone."

/companies/searchcriteria.x-amf-description: Use this to return a set of fields that are available to search on per country, or the common searchable fields in a combination of countries.'

parameters.name: section
parameters.description: Use CompanyReportResponse for the Company Credit Report JSON schema, DirectorReportResponse for the Director Report JSON schema.

parameters.name: template
parameters.description: For Templated Company Report JSON Schemas

parameters.name: countryCode
parameters.description: ISO2 / Alpha 2 Country Code

/companies/schema/{countryCode}.x-amf-description: Endpoint to retrieve the most up-to-date Report JSON schema for a given country.

get.description: Get the Report Customdata of a country.

parameters.name: template
parameters.description: Report template that will be used for retrieval. Full report by default.

parameters.description: country code the custom data relates to.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Authentication Token obtained from /authenticate. Can be expressed in the format "bearer tokenValue" or "tokenValue" alone."

customData.description:
DE report retrieval reason code:
1 - Credit Decisioning
2 - Credit Assessment - Future business connection (with credit risk)
3 - Credit Assessment - Existing business connection (with credit risk)
4 - Realisation check receivables collection
5 - Purchase Contract - Intention of signature of purchase contract (with credit risk)
6 - Goods Credit Insurance (with credit risk)
7 - Contract - Intention of signature of leasing or rent contract (with credit risk)
8 - Insurance Contract - Intention of signature of a insurance contract (with credit risk)

/reportcustomdata/{country}.x-amf-description: A set of available/required company report custom data key/value pairs.
